Watch me play with this fool. (SPEAKING SPANISH)
translation.es: Mira cómo juego con este tonto.

translation.en: Legger!
Who's the boy now, motherfucker? Huh?
Homeboy's gonna bury himself.
Just do the fucking puto and let's go.
So this is it, Lud.
This is how it ends. DeMille, what the fuck? Let's go, bro!
Shut up! I'm having fun!
Where? Where is the fucking disc?
Where's the disc?
Come here.
You're a lot tougher than that piece of shit husband you used to have.
translation.es: Eres más ruda que tu maldito esposo.

translation.en: You're getting ahead of yourself.
We're gonna be here all night. (CRASH)
You have to go, Linda. Wherever it is, you gotta go.
translation.es: Debes irte, Linda. Adonde sea, debes irte.

translation.en: I'm already packed.
Take care of yourself, Detective.
Where are you gonna go, cop killer?
I let myself in.
Clearly.
You all right, Tom? I was worried about you.
Apparently, I killed two deputies. Diskant's dead.
translation.es: Aparentemente, maté a dos oficiales. Diskant murió.

translation.en: Santos and DeMille dragged me off to die, so I put them down.
translation.es: Santos y DeMille trataron de matarme, así que los maté.

translation.en: Can you fix this, Jack?
Oh, I'm going to fix it. I'm going to fix it.
You know, I suspected that Santos and DeMille
were capering with Washington,
translation.es: Sospeché que Santos y DeMille estaban en algo sucio con Washington.

translation.en: but I didn't want to believe this kind of shit was going on in my unit.
translation.es: estaban en algo sucio con Washington. Pero no quería creerlo.

translation.en: Yeah. Me neither.
Boss, you better get Clady up here. I need you guys.
I'll get him in the loop.
I'm gonna get him up here right now. You need an alibi.
translation.es: Haré que venga. Te daré una coartada.

translation.en: You were sleeping on the couch after the party.
translation.es: Estabas durmiendo en el sillón después de la reunión.

translation.en: Santos and DeMille, they killed those deputies.
translation.es: Santos y DeMille mataron a los oficiales,

translation.en: Not you. Not you.
This is Clady's phone.
And his badge.
All this is you. It's you, Jack.
translation.es: Tú eres el responsable. Tú, Jack.

translation.en: It's you. It's you, Tom.
Own it! Fucking own it!
You knew they were cops!
Those guys were so deep undercover
that they... They lost their fucking minds!
Don't mourn them. You can't mourn them.
You set me up! You sent me in to die, Jack!
translation.es: ¡Me utilizaste! ¡Les dijiste que me mataran, Jack!

translation.en: I didn't set you up! You set yourself up!
I was trying to save you! You backed me up in a fucking corner!
You killed Washington! Fuck him!
Fuck Santos! Fuck DeMille! Fuck Clady! Fuck them all!
translation.es: ¡Que se pudran Santos, DeMille y Clady! ¡Al diablo con todos!

translation.en: Fuck them all!
They're a dime a dozen.
You...
You, man.
You're special.
You're special to me.
And Diskant?
He special?
I watched a good man die because of you.
translation.es: Alguien bueno murió por tu culpa.

translation.en: That is entirely
your fault.
Come on, Tom.
How do we get past this?
We got a destiny. You and me.
translation.es: Tenemos un destino. Tú y yo.

translation.en: Nobody's getting past this, Jack.
Everything ends now. You end now.
translation.es: Todo terminará ahora. Es tu fin.

translation.en: I surrender! I surrender.
Hook me and book me!
There's a rover right there!
Put it out! One for transport!
Goddamn! Tom Ludlow, he got his man now!
I found you.
I made you possible.
translation.es: Yo te metí a la Unidad.

translation.en: Now you need me more than ever, Tom.
translation.es: Ahora me necesitas más que nunca, Tom.

translation.en: What did you think I'd do when I found out?
translation.es: ¿Qué creías que iba a hacer cuando lo descubriera?

translation.en: Wait, man. Wait.
Wait.
My wall.
It's all there. In the wall.
translation.es: Todo está ahí. En la pared.

translation.en: These secrets, they're killing us.
translation.es: Es lo que nos hace fuertes.

translation.en: That's it. Open it up.
Open it up! Tear it down!
Tear it down!
That's it.
There it is.
This
is my power.
This is my crown.
I'm the king of secrets, Tom!
I know which city councilman is doing lines.
I know who likes boys. I know who's selling contracts.
translation.es: Sé quién prefiere niños, quién vende contratos,

translation.en: I know who... Who's beating his wife.
I own them! Even the Chief is in my pocket, Tom.
translation.es: ¡Los controlo! Incluso tengo al Jefe en mi bolsillo.

translation.en: How do you think that I've been able to protect you all these years?
translation.es: ¿Cómo crees que te he protegido todos estos años?

translation.en: What do you think it is that you're doing?
All these missions,
how do you think that you're able to touch the untouchables?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que puedes tocar a los intocables?

translation.en: I'm gonna be chief!
I will be chief!
I will be mayor!
This is our world, Tom!
So, let's take it!
That why you put a hit on Washington?
Why you tried to kill me?
So you can keep stuffing money in your wall?
translation.es: ¿Para poder almacenar dinero en la pared?

translation.en: But this is our money.
The unit's.
Who do you think paid for Silky's defense during all those lawsuits?
translation.es: ¿Quién pagó la defensa de Silky en todos los juicios?

translation.en: Who's gonna pay for your retirement?
I'm just correcting a flaw in the system, Tom.
This is about cops helping cops.
And if a teacher or a fireman could do it,
translation.es: Y si un profesor o un bombero pudiera hacerlo,

translation.en: they would do it, too.
What happened to just locking up bad people?
translation.es: ¿Y lo de encerrar a los malos?

translation.en: We're all bad, Tom.
You were my best friend.
We were family.
OFFICER: Drop it, Ludlow!
There's been enough killing.
I came as soon as you called.
Guess you're first on scene.
translation.es: Apuesto a que es el primero en la escena.

translation.en: Nope. You are.
Looks like Jack's friends got greedy and came after the money.
translation.es: Parece que los amigos de Jack se volvieron locos y vinieron por su dinero.

translation.en: Mmm-hmm. Is that what it looks like?
This is your plan, Captain?
Just sit back and let us all kill each other?
You were the plan.
No one else could touch him.
Once your eyes were opened, there was no other outcome.
translation.es: Una vez que abriste los ojos, tenía que pasar esto.

translation.en: Decisions were made, Tom,
translation.es: Las decisiones ya las habían tomado

translation.en: by powerful men with powerful secrets. Captain.
They were afraid of Jack.
They asked me to help.
One day, you will pass the Chief in the hall and he will give you a nod.
translation.es: Un día, verás al Jefe en el pasillo, y él asentirá con la cabeza.

translation.en: And you will know why.
Because you were right, Tom.
We do need you.
